name: Dice Simulator 2022
description:
Live out your fantasies of being a dice and being able to roll yourself!

In this game, you will jump, dive or roll to victory! But, you can only take a certain number of actions before you come to a stop, and that number is determine by the number you rolled! Yup, the top number when resting determines what you can do!

There are 6 levels to play in, each gradually teaching the game before one final challenge!
(there appears to be some collider issues, especially prevalent in level 6... this may be a rage game but I don't want it to be rage in that way, sorry)

Epilepsy Warning: Placing the camera right on top of the dice makes it panic, I haven't been able to fix it so if you are sensitive either avoid or be careful with the camera!

Controls:
Mouse or right joystick to look
esc or start/select to pause
wasd or left joystick to roll
shift or (X, Square)* to dive
spacebar or (A, Cross)* to jump

* Xbox Controller and Playstation Controller respectively

Made in Godot 4 alpha 12, I wanted to play around some more with the engine (and since my game is physics based, I wanted to use the improves physics engine)

It should run alright on most machines

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022
Actual project time was probably 24 hours, I was very occupied IRL
